body.name: 5 Tier Bookshelf, Tall Bookcase Modern Book Rack Storage Rack Shelves with Open Shelves Storage Organizer for Living Room, Bedroom, Kitchen, and Home Office, Rust
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 4 hrs 14 mins
features: 【Sturdy and Stable Construction】: Constructed from sturdy particle boards and black coated metal frame. Uniquely designed metal sidebars with X-shaped rod in the back provides constant stability. The bookshelf adopt excellent panel with each panel of the bookcase holding up to 30 lbs.

【Open Shelves Design】: Open shelves and stable structure provide enough storage space, allowing you to show off your displays in every direction. Perfect for organizing books, family photos, potted plants, CDs, decorations and more.

【Multiple Usage Scenarios】: Besides serving as a bookshelf for files and books in the study, this 5-tier bookshelf can be used as a greenery stand on the balcony; Serves as a baker’s rack in the kitchen; Acts as an exhibition stand to display decorative vases and trophies; Plays a role of a storage organizer in the bathroom to help you organize toiletries, etc.
【Modern Design】: This chic bookcase combines streamlined minimalism with modern style. Its elegant look and clean structure make it suitable for any room, both stylish and functional.

【Anti-tip Kits & Easy Assembly】: Please remember to install the anti-tilting tool on the wall for better stability and less unexpected injuries. You can easily complete the installation of the 5 shelf bookcase according to the installation video we provide.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple and Convenient
reviews.reviewText: Really easy to put together, instructions that came with were very easy to read, but honestly not very necessary by looking at it, but definitely help if needed. I do recommend putting the top and bottom shelves on first, then screwing in the other 3 in the middle, it will just help give some stability.The bookshelf itself stands fairly tall (not insane) I'm 5'3 and it comes right to the top of my head, with the top shelf around my chin's height. The shelves seem fairly sturdy, and it even came with anchors into the wall if you so need. Has so far held quite a bit of weight without any of the shelves themselves sinking. Overall definitely like this piece, and the price is well worth the piece/quality you get.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An actual quality "build it yourself" piece.
reviews.reviewText: I'm always very skeptical of buying shelves or other small furniture on Amazon. It seems as though the shelving is cheap, will start bending under weight over time, and the screws barely even fit in the predrilled holes. That was not the case at all here.This piece was a breeze. All the shelves themselves had a high quality finish on them. They didn't feel cheap or hollow, they were very dense and sturdy. Best of all, I didn't have problems with ANY of the supplies or screw holes on the set. Everything on it fit together flush as it should.This item was a pleasant surprise, and I might actually even try to find some more pieces from this same manufacturer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together took less then 30 minutes just a few parts. But it looks awesome! Its sturdy and holds alot of figurines on it. Very nice !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to put together and lightweight yet sturdy
reviews.reviewText: I needed an extra shelf for the hallway to store things.This shelf was the answer! It was very easy to put together and included an allen wrench. I used an impact drill and made sure I was delicate to assemble faster.There are a total of 5 shelves which offers plenty of shelving to store things. The spacing between each shelf is also generous which makes storing things of multiple sizes easy.The shelf is tall and somewhat narrow but has a sturdy design!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I would order this again.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This shelf is a lot better than what I was expecting for the price. It's light, but sturdy and it's attractive. It actually looks as nice as it is pictured.It is easy to put together. Just be sure the holes for the cross bar are facing the same direction. The directions and assembly video on the seller's page points that out. I watched my 10 year old put this shelf together, and she made the mistake of not having the holes faced correctly.It's light enough for me to move around the house, yet it's sturdy and doesn't feel like it'll fall apart when doing so.The height between the shelves fits a lot of our Lego sets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was easy to put together and it looks very nice in the living room.
